title: Elon Musk says his days are 'long and complicated' splitting time between SpaceX, Tesla and Twitter
description: Elon Musk talked about time management challenges of running Tesla, Twitter and SpaceX at a Wall Street Journal event

title: BlackRock bond chief Rieder says U.S. economy in 'much better shape’ than doomsayers say
description: Rick Rieder, a three-decade market veteran who oversees $2.4 trillion for BlackRock, is optimistic on the investment outlook despite the debt-ceiling impasse.

title: Virgin Orbit sells assets in bankruptcy auction to Rocket Lab, Stratolaunch and Vast's Launcher
description: Bankrupt rocket company Virgin Orbit sold its assets and equipment to a trio of aerospace companies in an auction.

title: The intensity of methane emissions from oil and gas sector has declined, study finds
description: The intensity of methane and greenhouse gas emissions from the oil and gas sector declined 28% and 30%, respectively, between 2019 and 2021, a study found.

title: Republicans question June 1 debt ceiling deadline as talks zero in on potential trade-offs
description: Debt ceiling negotiators are zeroing in on a small list of key issues after President Joe Biden and House Speaker Kevin McCarthy met Monday afternoon.

title: Former Fed Chair Ben Bernanke says there's more work ahead to control inflation
description: A research paper notes that inflation has evolved since ballooning to a 40-year high in the summer of 2022.

title: Peloton aims to rebrand as a fitness company for all with focus on app, tiered subscription pricing
description: Peloton has long been considered an in-home bike company for fitness junkies, but the company is working to change that by making its app accessible to all.

title: Uber to offer autonomous ride-hailing and delivery using Waymo's robotaxis
description: Uber's ride-hailing and delivery services will soon be offered by Waymo's autonomous vehicles -- at least in the Phoenix, Arizona metropolitan area.

title: New HIV infections decline in U.S. but most people at risk are not receiving prevention drugs
description: Just 11% of Black people and 21% of Hispanics who face a high risk from the virus received drugs to prevention HIV infection.

title: Microsoft says Bing can be default search engine for ChatGPT users
description: Users of the ChatGPT chatbot will be able  to turn on the Bing search engine plugin when it becomes available soon, Microsoft said.

title: Nike CEO John Donahoe says brands need to stand by their values amid DeSantis, Disney feud
description: Nike's CEO John Donahoe said during the inaugural CNBC CEO Council Summit it's important for corporations to fight for the values integral to their brands.

title: Alibaba to cut 7% of workforce in its cloud unit as it pursues IPO for the division
description: Alibaba's CEO Daniel Zhang has long-seen cloud computing as a key part of the e-commerce giant's future.

title: Hungary’s nationalist leader Orban says he wants Trump to win U.S. election
description: Europe's longest serving prime minister hopes Donald Trump will win the 2024 election.

title: Apple announces multibillion-dollar deal with Broadcom for U.S.-made chips
Turkish nationalist 'kingmaker' candidate throws support behind Erdogan, spelling peril for the opposition
description: The crucial presidential election in the country of 85 million is going to a runoff on May 28, since no candidate won more than 50% of the vote.

title: China's internet giants bet big on A.I. as Beijing looks to rival U.S. on tech 'paradigm shift'
description: On their March quarter earnings calls, Chinese tech giants Baidu, Alibaba and Tencent outlined progress they're making with the development of generative AI.

title: Saudi oil minister warns market speculators to 'watch out' ahead of OPEC+ meeting
description: Saudi oil minister Prince Abdulaziz bin Salman reiterated his warning that market speculators will be "ouching."

title: WhatsApp to allow users to edit messages — but only for up to 15 minutes of sending
description: WhatsApp will now allow users to edit messages within 15 minutes of sending them.

title: The IMF now expects the UK to avoid a recession
description: The International Monetary Fund says the U.K. will avoid entering a recession in 2023 and will maintain 'subdued' but positive growth.

title: Oil giant Shell braces for shareholder revolt over climate plans after record profits
description: Climate-focused investors are seeking to ramp up pressure on Shell at its annual meeting Tuesday, after an extraordinary run of record profits.

title: Cacti, wild coffee and false bananas: Scientists sketch out the menus of the future
description: CNBC's Sustainable Future takes a look at some of the crops that may have a big role to play in the future.

title: A common money mistake saw America's Got Talent judge Simon Cowell broke at 28 and living with his parents
description: British music mogul Simon Cowell wasn't always a savvy businessman. In fact, early on in his career, he almost went bankrupt.

title: Goldman Sachs says jobs mismatch drove up China's youth unemployment
description: Record unemployment among China's young people stems partly from a mismatch between their majors and available jobs, Goldman Sachs analysts said.

title: Pasta prices have surged, prompting crisis meetings in Italy and calls for a strike
description: Two weeks ago, Italy's Minister of Economic Development Adolfo Urso convened an emergency meeting tabling a discussion over the pasta price hike.

title: Bans, betrayals and stalemates: How Thailand's old guard could respond to election results
description: If the Move Forward party officially wins, its controversial policies could threaten the military and the monarchy.
